entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XmlWriter should allow setting not to output space before closing slash for empty elements #109629
  • [9.0][wasm] Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 8.0.11) or (= 6.0.36) #109627
  • [9.0][wasm] Wasm.Build.NativeRebuild.Tests.FlagsChangeRebuildTests.ExtraEmccFlagsSetButNoRealChange fails: xpected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI #109626
  • [9.0][wasm] Wasi.Build.Tests.HttpTests.HttpBuildThenRunThenPublish expects Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.wasi-wasm/9.0.1-ci but using 9.0.1 #109625
  • Utf8.TryWrite applies alignment by counting bytes instead of characters #109615
    10.0.0
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData) returns empty path on certain macOS #109614
  • Failed to locate managed application c3ab8ff13720e8ad9047dd39466b3c8974e592c2fa383d4a3960714caef0c4f2 #109611
  • Regressions from 3-opt #109613
  • Compiler bug in release mode #109606
  • Publish Failure in .NET 9 RC 2 for Blazor Web App (.NET 8, Auto Render Mode) and Blazor WASM (.NET 8) with Localization #109604
    8.0.x
  • Memory leak when polling ssl endpoint #109600

Closed

  • Consider publishing new version of System.Data.Common without transitive vulnerability #109551
  • EventPipe logging for self-describing events erroneously cache level/keyword #35393
  • Test failure: GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.cmd #107528
    10.0.0
  • Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimSession.Create Error #109368
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/TryCatchInFinally/TryCatchInFinally.cmd #109574
    10.0.0
  • Failing stepping when debugging managed code on Debug runtime #109589
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range) #107962
    10.0.0
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104618
    10.0.0
  • [wasi] `async`/`await` on WASIp2 #102894
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Cloned loop not fully strength reduced on arm64 #109412
    10.0.0
  • Problems when crosscompiling and statically linking openssl and icu #109175
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove and readd .deb, .rpm, and .pkg as FileExtensionSignInfos #109628
    needs-area-label
  • [EventTrace] AddEventPipe filter data parsing #109624
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Update Android image to one with a new NDK and command line tools #109622
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reference net10.0 path for ILLink.Tasks assembly #109619
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update IHttpClientLogger.cs and IHttpClientAsyncLogger.cs remarks #109618
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Change arm64 asm code to load function addresses via GOT #109617
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Respect `ClassInterfaceAttribute` during COM server activation #109616
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Check in offsets files used for AOT cross compilers #109612
    area-Build-mono
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Mark some intrinsics as must-expand for NAOT due to ILScanner dependencies #109609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `DAMT.*WithInherited` #109608
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add left handed spherical and cyclindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Apply OverloadResolutionPriority to Span-based delegating to ROS counterparts #109602
    area-System.Memory
  • Build the cdac as part of clr.tools instead of as a prereq to the runtime native build #109598
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Clarifying instructions for GenerateReferenceAssemblySource target #109468
    area-Meta
  • Change iOS PEM searcher to use PemEncoding.TryFindUtf8 #109564
    area-System.Security
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #109563
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unify corerun's implementation of the native debugger check with the minipal for all platforms #109599
    area-Host
  • Fix servicing version of Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #109238
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #109620
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Don't split up partially-hot call-finally pairs during 3-opt layout #109592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix debug-only assert in IsInPlaceSingleStep #109603
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Clean up code with `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` #109507
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Don't drop the warning/error code and type when overriding by binlog #109607
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add wrappers for platform-specific SHA-256 implementations #109559
    area-ILTools-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2577548 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #109580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg #109253
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Gc poll without HELPER_METHOD_FRAME #109378
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Block exporting DllMain #109545
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109596
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109595
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Release/8.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109579
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • [cdac] Handle non-default active version and explicit IL code version cases for `CodeVersions.GetActiveNativeCodeVersion` #109560
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [DRAFT] Allow using H/3 with WinHttpHandler #109508
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
